Summary: Amber in color, bright to dim no sound, moving fast then very fast no strobes.
divs: Sighting Details my wife and myself were enjoying the fireworks when i noticed a amber light moving evenly across the night sky toward us.the light was pulsing slowly from not to bright to dim.there was no sound from this light source that i could here over the fire works.this light seemed to be larger than a private plane ,moving southeast approaching town then turned left to the north,then it picked up speed and out of sight from large to nothing in 2 seconds.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Moscow Mills
There were no other sightings in Moscow Mills on or around July 4th 2008
